name: ha-mcp
description: Home Assistant MCP Server - Complete control of Home Assistant through MCP
long_description: A production-ready Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to control Home Assistant smart home systems. Features include fuzzy entity search, real-time device monitoring, automation management, script execution, and comprehensive smart home control through 20+ specialized tools.

tools.name: ha_search_entities
tools.description: Fuzzy search for Home Assistant entities by name, area, or domain

tools.name: ha_get_entity
tools.description: Get detailed state and attributes of a specific entity

tools.name: ha_call_service
tools.description: Call any Home Assistant service with parameters

tools.name: ha_control_device
tools.description: High-level device control with state verification

tools.name: ha_find_related_entities
tools.description: Find entities related to a given entity
